laboratory_examinations.findings: Total plasma porphyrins: 162.3 µg/dL (normal, 0-0.9 µg/dL); Uroporphyrin I in urine: 5040 nmol/L (normal, 0-90 nmol/L); Uroporphyrin I in erythrocytes: 1703 µg/dL (normal, 0-24 µg/dL); Coproporphyrin I in urine: 48,160 nmol/L (normal, 0-300 nmol/L); Coproporphyrin I in stool: 3970 nmol/g (normal, 0-200 nmol/g).
Total plasma porphyrin levels decreased significantly to 20.7 µg/dL.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Marked decrease in total plasma porphyrin levels over time.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Demonstrated complete engraftment of donor stem cells.
